actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 relating to a minimum annual apportionment for each State for general aviation airport development.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to establish a minimum annual apportionment to States for airport development projects under such Act for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 relating to a minimum annual apportionment for each State for general aviation airport development.
